resources.description: List of public authorities from WhatDoTheyKnow
List of UK public bodies bound by EU procurement legislation from EC Directorate-General “Internal Market and Services"
List of UK Contracting Authorities that have issued contract announcements above thresholds in OJEU between April 2008 and 28th January 2010

name: uk-public-bodies
notes:
Looking for a list of all UK public bodies, including but not limited to:

  * Departments
  * Agencies
  * Non-departmental public bodies
  * Local authorities

This package may act as a parent package to other relevant lists/datasets. In the first instance, these can be linked to from here.

A few examples and relevant links:

  * Scottish [National Devolved Public Bodies](http://www.scotland.gov.uk/Topics/Government/public-bodies/about/Bodies)
  * DirectGov [A-Z of Central Government](http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Dl1/Directories/A-ZOfCentralGovernment/index.htm)
  * List of public authorities on [What Do They Know](http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/body/list/a) - and [as CSV](http://www.whatdotheyknow.com/body/all-authorities.csv)
  * Guardian's list of [Every Quango in Britain](http://ckan.net/package/uk-quango-data)
  * EC Directorate-General “Internal Market and Services" [List of UK public bodies bound by EU procurement legislation](http://ec.europa.eu/internal_market/publicprocurement/docs/authorities/uk_en.pdf) (suggested by [Jose L. Marin on 2010-01-10](http://twitter.com/jluismarin/status/8317314656)). 
  * [According to Jose L. Marin](http://twitter.com/jluismarin/status/8318393714): "Euroalert is going to contribute with its 3334 list of UK bodies that have published contracts in EU since 2008."
  * CIPFA codes ([suggested by Chris Taggart](http://twitter.com/CountCulture/status/8317333897)). Requested by [Chis Taggart on 2010-01-28](http://twitter.com/CountCulture/status/8318670533).
  * List of [Non-departmental public bodies](http://www.civilservice.gov.uk/about/resources/public-bodies.aspx) from Cabinet Office ([in PDF](http://www.civilservice.gov.uk/Assets/PublicBodies2008_tcm6-6429.pdf))
  * List of [UK Public bodies that have issued contract announcements above thresholds in Official Journal of the European Union] (http://euroalert.net/en/help_tenders_opendata_contributions_authorities.aspx#CA-uk)  between April 2008 and 28th January 2010 from Euroalert.net
  * [UK Crown bodies](http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/information-management/our-services/uk-crown-bodies.htm) (subject to Crown copyright) as [suggested by](http://twitter.com/davidpidsley/status/47781883710423040) David Pidsley
  * Local authorities (and similar administative areas like counties, parishes etc.) are listed in Ordnance Survey's OpenData e.g. http://data.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/doc/7000000000038339 (Licence: http://www.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/oswebsite/docs/licences/os-opendata-licence.pdf )
  * [Local authorities at openlylocal.com](http://openlylocal.com/)
title: UK Public Bodies
